category.name: Cake Pops
category.special_instructions: Bite-sized joy wrapped in frostingâ€”that's a cake pop.

menu_items.name: Chocolate Cake Pop
menu_items.description: Bite-sized chocolate cake mixed with chocolate buttercream, dipped in chocolaty icing and topped with white sprinkles.

menu_items.name: Vanilla Cake Pop
menu_items.description: Moist vanilla cake blended with creamy buttercream, dipped in a rich white chocolate coating, and topped with delicate vanilla bean specks for a classic, elegant finish.

menu_items.name: Orange Cream Cake Pop
menu_items.description: Orange cream cake mixed with buttercream, dipped in chocolaty icing and finished with an orange slice design.

menu_items.name: Birthday Cake Pop
menu_items.description: Bite-sized vanilla cake mixed with vanilla buttercream, dipped in pink chocolaty icing and topped with white sprinkles.
